page.title: 14GETTING AWAY FROM WINCANTON
page.content: >>>{THIS IS THE AGE OF THE TRAIN ?}>>> In fact the Wincanton section of the old Somerset & Dorset Railway closed in 1966, when I was born. Hi folks of the future! My name is {Stephen Fred P Ryley,}I am 19. I have found the lack of public transport {jolly inconvenient. Here's a f'rinstance: the nearest train station is in Castle Cary,seven miles away, so you need your own transport to use the public transport! To get to Taunton,the train first takes you in the{wrong direction for a \ hour. I went to secondary school in Bruton 5 miles away, for 7 years. I spent{39 days on the bus,and{two months}waiting for it! You people of the future, you have got it dead cushy compared with me. You don't know you're born... ...come to think of it,you're{not!
